sentence.text: It is a genetic disorder caused by a mutation in the dysferlin gene (monocyte activation involved in immune response) with an autosomal recessive mode of inheritance.

entity.text: monocyte activation involved in immune response

sentence.text: In this article, we report a case of Limb-girdle muscular dystrophy cardiac muscle tissue development 2B with a rare homozygous duplication c.164dupA, p.(Ile57Hisfs*8) (rs863225020) in monocyte activation involved in immune response in a Saudi patient.

entity.text: monocyte activation involved in immune response
